#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

void FastIO(){ios_base::sync_with_stdio(0);cin.tie(NULL);cout.tie(NULL);}


int main(void)
{
	FastIO();
	ll t;
	cin >> t;
	for(;t>0;t--)
	{
	    char s[1000000];
	    ll i,ans=0;
	    
	    cin >> s;
	    ll a[strlen(s)];

		
		sort(s,s+strlen(s));
		
		for(i=0;i<strlen(s);i++)
		{
			if(s[i]!=s[i+1])
		    {
		    	ans++;
		    }			
		}
		
		if(ans%2==0)
		{
			cout<<"Terrorist"<<endl;
		}
		
		else
		{
			cout<<"Counter Terrorist"<<endl;
		}
	}
 }
